name: Personal Website
description: A personal website showcasing projects and experiences, featuring a client-side LLM powered by webLLM. The embedded chatbot uses a Gemma-2 2B model with a custom RAG pipeline and is built with TypeScript, React, HTML, and CSS.

name: Cafe Order Assistant
description: An AI-powered barista agent that converts natural language orders into structured actions, checks inventory, and manages payments. Implemented as a state-machine agent using OpenAI tool calls to manage conversation flow and interactions.

name: Whatsapp LLM
description: A fine-tuned Mistral 7B model trained on 250,000 WhatsApp messages to emulate personal writing style and knowledge. Built using Unsloth and QLoRA for efficient training with a custom conversational template.
